attributes.action: We call upon HM Government NOT to implement a further In/Out EU referendum’
attributes.additional_details:
Mr George Soros (Financier) this morning in the EU is even referring to that petition (click http://www.cnbc.com/2016/06/30/brexit-is-a-negative-shock-soros.html ) as if to give it some authority - of which it has none.

BBC - click here: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-eu-referendum-36629324

Telegraph: http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/06/25/could-britain-actually-have-a-second-referendum-on-brexit/

Many of us vote in elections we dont like the result, we dont then start a petition to reverse it - or re-run the election
attributes.background:
There seems to be a petition with many millions of signatures on - apparently from all over the World to seek a further referendum.

I am advised by TV political commentators that many of these 'signatories' are ineligible to vote in the UK - and we feel this petition needs a counter base.
